018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication;
019
020import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
021import static org.junit.Assert.assertFalse;
022import static org.junit.Assert.assertTrue;
023
024import java.util.EnumSet;
025import java.util.List;
026import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ClusterMetrics;
027import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ClusterMetrics.Option;
028import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseClassTestRule;
029import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ServerName;
030import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Admin;
031import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Put;
032import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.testclassification.MediumTests;
033import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.testclassification.ReplicationTests;
034import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Bytes;
035import org.junit.ClassRule;
036import org.junit.Test;
037import org.junit.experimental.categories.Category;
038
039@Category({ ReplicationTests.class, MediumTests.class })
040public class TestReplicationStatusSourceStartedTargetStoppedWithRecovery
041  extends TestReplicationBase {
042
043  @ClassRule
044  public static final HBaseClassTestRule CLASS_RULE =
045    HBaseClassTestRule.forClass(TestReplicationStatusSourceStartedTargetStoppedWithRecovery.class);
046
047  @Test
048  public void testReplicationStatusSourceStartedTargetStoppedWithRecovery() throws Exception {
049    // stop all region servers, we need to keep the master up as the below assertions need to get
050    // cluster id from remote cluster, if master is also down, we can not get any information from
051    // the remote cluster after source cluster restarts
052    stopAllRegionServers(UTIL2);
053    // add some values to cluster 1
054    for (int i = 0; i < NB_ROWS_IN_BATCH; i++) {
055      Put p = new Put(Bytes.toBytes("row" + i));
056      p.addColumn(famName, Bytes.toBytes("col1"), Bytes.toBytes("val" + i));
057      htable1.put(p);
058    }
059    Thread.sleep(10000);
060    restartSourceCluster(1);
061    Admin hbaseAdmin = UTIL1.getAdmin();
062    ServerName serverName = UTIL1.getHBaseCluster().getRegionServer(0).getServerName();
063    Thread.sleep(10000);
064    ClusterMetrics metrics = hbaseAdmin.getClusterMetrics(EnumSet.of(Option.LIVE_SERVERS));
065    List<ReplicationLoadSource> loadSources =
066      metrics.getLiveServerMetrics().get(serverName).getReplicationLoadSourceList();
067    assertEquals(2, loadSources.size());
068    boolean foundRecovery = false;
069    boolean foundNormal = false;
070    for (ReplicationLoadSource loadSource : loadSources) {
071      if (loadSource.isRecovered()) {
072        foundRecovery = true;
073        assertTrue(loadSource.hasEditsSinceRestart());
074        assertEquals(0, loadSource.getTimestampOfLastShippedOp());
075        assertTrue(loadSource.getReplicationLag() > 0);
076      } else {
077        foundNormal = true;
078        assertFalse(loadSource.hasEditsSinceRestart());
079        assertEquals(0, loadSource.getTimestampOfLastShippedOp());
080        assertEquals(0, loadSource.getReplicationLag());
081      }
082    }
083    assertTrue("No normal queue found.", foundNormal);
084    assertTrue("No recovery queue found.", foundRecovery);
085  }
086}
